name: smart-eng

scripts.start: npm run build & npm run python & node ./src/server.js
scripts.buildpython: cd ./python/ && python3 -m venv venv && source ./venv/bin/activate && pip3 install -r ./requirements.txt
scripts.postinstall: npm run buildpython && npm run build

author: Eduardo Oliveira Batista
description: Web application for managing civil engineering project's budget.
